mapper.select: select * from review order by regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into review(rno, title, content,regdate, visited, rec) values (rseq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update review set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where rno=#{rno}
update review set visited=visited+1 where rno=#{rno}
